<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Filtering runs with empty results with the visualization mode enabled results in an undefined state: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/86395530-aeb35900-bca0-11ea-9349-adcdcc108f62.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Go to the comparison table, filter runs with a dummy query foo:bar, the query generates an empty result and the dashboard does not get updated. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should reset the dashboard as well. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
UI v1.1.0
